title: How to be cracked in CSE?

comments.body: Smoke weed specially sourced from the lake beside the EC campus
The first step is to watch The Social Network at least 20 times and then Mr. Robot another 20 times
Does the river inside RR campus also count?
Of course, how do you not know about the holy river
i am already getting them at nbx pesubh rr...i couldn't care less to go to ec campus...
i already watched social network  like what 5 times, its enough, these days to be cracked, following yacine in twitter is kinda kino
